site_name: Rear Of 109 - 111 Fulham Palace RoadLondonW6 8JA
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details of detailed drawings (scale no less than 1:20) and samples of materials pursuant to condition 3; Construction Management Plan and Construction Logistics Plan pursuant to condition 4; Air Quality Dust Management Plan pursuant to condition 5; Ultra Low NOx Gas fired boilers pursuant to condition 6; mechanical ventilation system with NOx, PM2.5 filtration pursuant to condition 7; noise assessment pursuant to condition 8; enhanced  sound insulation value DnT,w and L'nT,w of at least 5dB above the Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling /wall structures separating different types of rooms/ uses in adjoining dwellings pursuant to condition 9; sound insulation of the floor/ ceiling/ walls separating the commercial part(s) of the premises from dwellings pursuant to condition 10; preliminary risk assessment report pursuant to condition 11; site investigation scheme pursuant to condition 12; quantitative risk assessment report pursuant to condition 13; Surface Water Management Strategy pursuant to condition 17; full postal address pursuant to condition 18; flood risk measures pursuant to condition 24; obscure glazing pursuant to condition 27 of planning permission ref: 2023/01943/VAR granted 21st December 2023.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
